name: Forward Skip
steps: Stand with your feet shoulder-width apart and your arms at your sides.
Begin by hopping off your left foot and landing on your right foot.
Immediately hop off your right foot and land on your left foot.
Continue hopping back and forth in a rhythmic pattern.
As you gain momentum, lift your knees higher and pump your arms in a running motion.
comments: Make sure to land softly on the balls of your feet to minimize impact on your joints.
As you become more comfortable with the exercise, you can increase the speed and height of your jumps.
